p: Thirst is influenced by changes in plasma osmolality and plasma sodium (Kavouras, 2002 ▶; Toth and Gardiner, 2000 ▶), as well as intracellular dehydration (Greenleaf, 1992 ▶). According to some studies, the perception of thirst increases when plasma osmolality and plasma sodium demonstrate an increase (Fitzsimons, 1976 ▶; Toth and Gardiner, 2000 ▶).
